attributes.action: Have a government set up more like a coalition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears to me that all these MP's in parliament only seem to argue, criticise and ridicule their opposition. What good is that doing the people of this country? Why not set up the government more like a coalition so they work together to get the best for our country. We have one party criticising another, when the more constructive thing to do would to be advise. Is it really that hard? This isn't labour's country for the conservatives to criticise or vice versa, it's OUR country, and more action rather than talking needs to be done!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
